text:
Hey everybody, Rachel here, and I'm fresh
back from the YouTube EDU conference that
I went to in San Bruno just last week.

It was a lot of fun getting to know other
people who are making educational content
for YouTube.
These fine people, as well as some others.

And it got me thinking: I know teachers are
using my videos, but I don't really know who
they are, or what they're doing with them.
And I would love to be in touch with you.

So, if you're a teacher who has used one of
my videos either in your classroom, or as

an assignment for a student, go ahead and
send me an email.

My email is going to be in the description
of this video.

I would just like to start an open dialog
with you.

What are you using the videos for, are you
finding them helpful, and what would you like
to see done differently?

Maybe for a series of specific videos for
classroom use.

What topics do you wish you had access to
that you can't find on my website?
And, anything else you want me to know.

I really hope to hear from some of the fantastic
teachers who are out there making a difference
in the classroom.

That's it, and thanks so much
for using Rachel's English.
